summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6702 for the improvement of 34th Avenue South fom South Mount BNaker Boulevard to South Plum Street; certain other streets, avenues and alleys, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a Local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 107419 to revise the maximum interest payable on local improvement bonds.
